title: FLCL Alternative
synopsis: Life seems to drift by for Kana Koumoto and her friends in their small Japanese town. Every day is just like the last, and it feels like every new day will be the same. Kana goes to school, hangs out with her friends, and likes to paint her nails and listen to music, but it feels like nothing special is ever going to happen.
staff: [['Terashima-Furuta, Maki', ['Producer']], ['Uemura, Yutaka', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Motohiro, Katsuyuki', ['Director']], ['Suzuki, Kiyotaka', ['Director']]]
